plot: Morality and freedom of conscience comes from critical thinking and not from the supernatural. Based on Robert G. Ingersoll's unabridged 1887 essay on secularism and freethought.
title: Secularism-A Short Film
plot_es: Morality and freedom of conscience comes from critical thinking and not from the supernatural. Based on Robert G. Ingersoll's unabridged 1887 essay on secularism and freethought.
plot_en: Morality and freedom of conscience comes from critical thinking and not from the supernatural. Based on Robert G. Ingersoll's unabridged 1887 essay on secularism and freethought.
